quest.name: Call of the Forest
journal: Baderon has information on a new task.
According to Baderon, the Adventurers' Guild in Gridania is recruiting people for an as-yet-undisclosed task. You can learn more by speaking with Miounne, the proprietress of the Carline Canopy.
You have expressed your interest in the task to Miounne. Let her know when you are ready to hear the details.
objectives: Speak with Miounne at the Carline Canopy in Gridania.

dialogue.name: BADERON
dialogue.text: Ready to 'ear about that job, then? Like I said, the request comes from our sister guild in Gridania.

dialogue.name: BADERON
dialogue.text: ...An' that's all I know. But whatever it is ye get asked to do, I some'ow doubt it'd pose any trouble fer a 'venturer as survived the bedlam in Sastasha.

dialogue.name: BADERON
dialogue.text: If ye think ye might be interested, ye'll want to 'ave words with Mother Miounne, me counterpart in Gridania. Good luck, lassmate!

dialogue.name: MIOUNNE
dialogue.text: Take a seat wherever you like, friend. Our waitress will come to take yourâ”€

dialogue.name: MIOUNNE
dialogue.text:
Oh, it's you, Forename! 'Tis so good to see you again!
...What's that? Here at Baderon's suggestion, you say?

dialogue.name: MIOUNNE
dialogue.text: The foul-mouthed rogue sends me word that an adventurer might be along for the job, and it turns out to be you! Well, this makes things a lot easier, doesn't it?

dialogue.name: MIOUNNE
dialogue.text:
Oh? Not here to dine? Dare I hope that you're the adventurer Baderon sent word about?
...You are!? The Matron be praised!

dialogue.name: MIOUNNE
dialogue.text: Allow me to introduce myself. My name is Miounne, and the Carline Canopy is my place.

dialogue.name: MIOUNNE
dialogue.text: With regard to the task in question, there is a fair bit to tell. Let me know when you're ready to hear the details, and I shall brief you.
